title: Combined Process List Between WSL and Windows
body: I'd love to see the process list that's available from CMD's "tasklist" added to WSL's "ps" command.  I understand that'll take some process ID juggling, but I think it's doable.  If I'm in a bash shell and I do a "ps auxww" I'd love to see *every* process running on the box, not just what's in WSL.
